title.narrative: Jaffna and Kilinochchi Water Supply Project-Additional Financing

description.narrative: The project will improve drinking water supply in the urban areas of the Jaffna Peninsula, one of the less-developed regions of Sri Lanka. The additional financing is required to fund the changes in project scope that includes design build and operation (DBO) of a desalination plant; and meet the cost overruns of the current project, whose performance is on track but requires restructuring to deliver the project outcomes.

participating-org.narrative: Ministry of City Planning and Water Supply (formerly Ministry of Water Supply and Drainage)
National Water Supply and Drainage Board
